data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About the Announcements Module

The Announcements Module produces a list of simple text announcements consisting of a title and brief description. Options include a read more link to a file, page or other site, announcement publish date and expiration date. Link click tracking and logging are also available. Announcements are ordered from newest to oldest, unless a view order is specified.

Add an Announcement

  1. Add an Announcements module, or go to an existing Announcements module.
  2. Click Add New Announcement.
  3. At Title, enter a title for the announcement.
  4. At Add Date (optional), remove the tick if you do not want the current day and date to be displayed beside the title.
  5. At Description, enter a description of the Announcement.
  6. At Link Type (optional), select URL, Page or File and then at Link select or enter the required link, page or file.
  7. At Track Number Of Times This Link Is Clicked? (optional), check the box if required.
  8. At Log The User, Date, And Time For Every Link Click (optional), check the box if required.
  9. At Expires (optional) click Calendar and select the expiry date for the Announcement.
  10. At View Order (optional), enter the View Order for the Announcement.
  11. Click Update.
